summary: Sprint costs nothing out of combat because why smell the roses when you could run them over.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]WHY YOU MADE THIS BRO?[/u][/b]
So Skyrim ( and all Bethesda games to some degree ) have this issue where you will at some point spend time just travelling from point A to point B.  This happens even in my game that I have desperately crammed a bunch of mods into in an effort to make combat happen as much as possible.  These periods of quiet travel are made better if I can sprint like a mad man.  That's why I made this.



[b][u]YO WHAT THIS DO?
[/u][/b]Basically, if you're not in combat then sprinting costs no stamina and you can do it forever.
If you enter combat, sprinting costs the normal amount.


[b][u]IS THIS GOING TO DO BAD THINGS
[/u][/b]No.  Thanks to a friend of mine I made this mod in the smart way that doesn't destroy everything.  No constantly running scripts.  The script it has is very short and only runs when you start sprinting, hence no performance impact.


Thank You to:
- tonycubed2 for making sure I made the mod correctly, check out his awesome mod Ultimate Deadly Encounters ( http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12452/? )


Shout out:
- if you want sprinting to be free all the time no matter what, check out Carry On Sprinting by Shaedanna ( http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73023/? )



[b][u]FAQ
[/u][/b]
[i]Q: Shouldn't this be in the cheating category?  Isn't this cheating?  AREN'T YOU A CHEATER!?
[/i][b]A: No, because this doesn't change what happens during combat.  Out of combat this just means you don't have to keep doing that dumb thing where you slow down for a few seconds repeatedly.[/b][b]

[/b][i]Q: Can you upload a video of what the mod does?
[/i][b]A: No... primarily because my modded Skyrim is constant porn.  Also because wtf even?

[/b][i]Q: Will this make me into a cool Naruto ninja?
[/i][b]A: Naruto is an anime about wizards, not ninjas.

[/b][i]Q: Are you going to make something like this for Fallout 4?
[/i][b]A: Yeah probably.  It's probably gonna be part of the remake of my Fallout 3 mod... the one that breaks your legs if you carry too much.

[/b][i]Q: I love you.
[/i][b]A: Get out of my bookstore.[/b]
author: FishBiter
